text: Ej kasone, ki ʙa Alloh va rasulaş imon ovardaed, ʙo mardume, ki Alloh ʙar onho xaşm giriftaast, dūstī makuned. Inho ʙa saʙaʙi kufraşon az rahmati Alloh va savoʙi oxirat noumed şudand, hamcunon ki on kofirone, ki dar gūr xufta az haqiqati kor voqif şudand va ʙo ilmi jaqin donistand, ki az savoʙi oxirat noumed hastand
